title: Drawing, "The Artist's Drawing Room on Lake Constance", 1816
medium: Brush and brown wash, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: On the mat, lower center:  Interieur du mon petit Salon a Constance/ 1816
provenance:
Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Christie's, New York, January 28, 2000, lot 84; 
Agnew's, London
description: The brown wash grisaille rendering creates a serene atmosphere, with views of ancient churches and castles seen through open windows. The sparsely furnished room, belonging to the artist, is furnished in the French taste, as seen in the asymmetrical chair between the windows and the lyre-supported table in front of it.  The straight lines of Neo-Classicism pervade the small salon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Artist's Drawing Room on Lake Constance", 1816.
1816. Brush and brown wash, graphite on white wove paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-1.
